name: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!----Additional Official English translation &#40Tappytoon&#4
